a (might stupid) question...
what is seeding and leeching?

BTW what is actually a seeder and a leecher
i know that seeding makes download faster and leeching does make it slower but what are they and how can sombody seed?

A seeder is one who has already downloaded the file and is sharing the file to other people who needs that exact file.

A leecher is one who is "leeching" off of seeders' shared information. (He takes the information of the file)
